title: Legal Q&A Chat Page with Session Management
description: Update chat page to support both new conversations and session restoration. Add URL parameter handling (?session={sessionId}) for restoring past chats. Implement loading state for session history fetch. Display full conversation history when restoring session. Add 'New Chat' button to start fresh conversation.
